article.title: How good is the generalized Langevin equation to describe the dynamics of photo-induced electron transfer in fluid solution?

multiple_choice_question.text: What does the chemical structure in Figure 1 depict?
What is the most significant difference observed between the spectra of Pe and PeDMA in Figure 2?
choices: PeDMA spectra show a prominent vibronic progression.
PeDMA spectra are red-shifted compared to Pe spectra.
PeDMA spectra exhibit a larger Stokes shift than Pe spectra.

multiple_choice_question.text: How does changing solvent polarity affect the absorption and emission spectra of PeDMA?
choices: Both absorption and emission show pronounced bathochromic shifts.
Absorption shows minimal changes, while emission shows significant bathochromic shifts.
Emission shows minimal changes, while absorption shows significant bathochromic shifts.
Both absorption and emission show minimal changes.

multiple_choice_question.text: What does the integral term in Equation 1 represent?
choices: The potential energy of the reacting system.
The noise term acting on the system.
The non-Markovian friction experienced by the system.
The acceleration of the reacting species.
